archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Lead Verification
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Objective: Allow simultaneous Lead Verification, Quality Control, and MainDB Contacts update
Key Features: - Lists creation and assignment for specific teams and users - Verify contacts online/phone with automatic contacts feed - Approval by Team Leads - Simultaneous Quality Control - Prepare Client reports - MainDB update for Contacts and Companies info - LV and QC teams productivity monitoring and reporting - Department statistics
Key Users: - Lead Verification Teams (OVS, PVS, RDS) - 255 - LV Team Lead - 42 - LV Assessors - 3 - Quality Control Team (QC) - 42 - СС - 75 - СAT (role LA) - 9 - DB/ListGen (role LA) - 13
